summary: This is a brief internal email or memo dated July 9, 2019, providing an update on the suicide watch and psychological observation status of inmate Jeffrey Epstein, who was in custody at the time. It indicates he was not on suicide watch but was under psychological observation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the memo, identified by inmate number 76318-054, whose suicide watch and psychological observation status is being reported.

events.title: Status Update on Epstein's Custody Conditions
events.description: An internal update is sent regarding Jeffrey Epstein's status, noting he is not on suicide watch but is under psychological observation.

keyFacts: The document is dated July 9, 2019, which is approximately one month before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein was identified by inmate number 76318-054 and was under psychological observation at the time.
The memo explicitly states Epstein was not on suicide watch as of this update.
